author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Swollen eyes, headache & what not… how do I survive the day?

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: I just don’t understand why guys just ghost / disappeared without ending it. Don’t leave the other party hanging. That isn’t fair!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text:
For the past 2 mths, I hv bn crying my heart out! Sad, Depressing & tired! It takes a toll on me & my body. 
I got the answer that I wanted & surely he moved on so fast. How I wish, I cld do that?! If that’s so easy, why is it so difficult & painful? I gv my everything.

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: The norm of last min work allocation 😡 why inform last minute when it cld have said earlier! Respect ppl’s time! Don’t assume that all are free! No wonder no one is giving 100% on their daily work!🤦‍♀️

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Eid Mubarak! In peach or light pink! https://t.co/gwzlRqVRaP

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Alhamduillah for the long weekend. Managed to bake 1 cake & 1 cookie, cook 3 dishes: beef rendang, chicken lemak chilli padi & bee Hoon briyani! 💕🥰

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text:
#RamadanChallenge Day 29: selfie of your last day fasting 
2022 Last Iftar with my Bestie! Steamboat dinner, he loved my homemade prawn stock!🥰☺️ https://t.co/Z0XoHgonjw

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Verdict: I used Danish butter cookies recipe with my own take of using Pandan flavour & Pandan paste. The cookies are buttery & melt-in-the mouth texture. It does taste like Danish butter cookies. On the contrary, the 20g milk powder is overpowering. The smell is very strong. 😋 https://t.co/m8RlsTXgiZ

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Alhamduillah, I may not have not have done what is expected or recommended in Ramadan but I have tried each & everyday to be a better version of myself & I’m proud of it! I pray that I keep improving & continue with the good habits aft Ramadan as well. Ameen!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text:
8. Attend Arabic classes, tafsir
9. Making lots of doa / learning diff types of doa
10. Keeping a Positive spirit
11. Booked Eid prayers in the mosque with Mum & sis

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text:
3. Started reciting the Quran - not all but some small surahs here & there
4. Giving more for charity 
5. 1st time praying terawih - only tried today 
6. Explored praying in mosque - aft the longest time & unusual places thanks to supportive fren
7. Keep out of bad habits

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text:
Of the many things I had done better compared to last Ramadan, some are:
1. Started praying everyday: slowly included Sunnah prayers as well
2. Fasted more days compared to last year thanks to Allah & for the long holidays - while being unwell most days

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text:
Thinking that I will never be able to make it, felt upset. Reflected upon it. 
Then I told myself, alhamduillah each day I get up, I’m given an opportunity to repent for my sins & better myself. So I’m going to do better than last Ramadan.

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Everyone has a long to do list in Ramadan. I was overwhelmed when I read it. Am I able to do all of it? It is a month of reward, how am I going to complete all of this? I don’t know how to do some of it! How how how? I was so worried abt the list of others.

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Late night baked again! Absolute 💕 fav Kek Gula Hangus https://t.co/2O5H7evpWK

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Supposed to have dinner with mum. Romantic mum & 1st daughter date. But was cancelled since sis didn’t go out! So Iftar alone again. 🙁

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text:
#RamadanChallenge Day 28: favourite Ramadan memory 2021 
with my small family https://t.co/ZFiL91mUUR

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text:
#RamadanChallenge Day 27: thank & post someone important today
Thankful for everything in life! Alhamduillah! Yesterday my colleague shared Islamic knowledge & app she finds useful. Good to have ppl to talk & share abt Islam.

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: #RamadanChallenge Day 26: pray with yr family - have never done that before. Maybe one day in the near future perhaps 🤷‍♀️ insya’allah

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: #RamadanChallenge Day 25: favourite Ramadan meal  - I love the old traditional Iftar porridge that has vermicelli in it. The ones I used to eat when I was 5-10 years old, fr the mosque really very tasty. https://t.co/rIrvEGN2Y1

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: #Ramadanchallenge Day 24: favourite Hadith - hmm no favourite as of now. But I can relate to this one. https://t.co/j0CeQvBBe0

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Early morning bakes! Kueh Dahlia! The one in trend for this raya with chocolate chip in the middle didn’t attract me. I like to stick to traditions. So decided to bake one myself! Different recipe though! Can’t taste now. Will wait for the evening. https://t.co/tewzQPD7Pf

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Today Iftar: grilled barramundi with vegetables. Too healthy that I had to hav sinful dessert: sticky date pudding. It’s was fabulous!😋 reward for fasting the whole day aft having diarrhoea in the mrg & aft a tough spin class! https://t.co/HJ9QUwAFXo

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: And yes I’m doing better than last year. Mission accomplished but I still want to finish strong! Allah please help me! Alhamduillah!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: This whole week kept having migraine. I ate, drank water, took medication but it’s still there. Last 3 days I’m going to get thru this. All I wanted for this Ramadan to be better than last year. Wanted to fast more days than last year.

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Long weekend starts! I’m gonna try to bake!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Have not been feeling so well! 4 more days to go! I can do this!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Very hurt by the comment! If you have nothing nice to say don’t say at all! And you are my friend! 🤦‍♀️

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Reached home at 7pm. Waited an hour for cab. Last person to leave school. Continuing with work now! 😔

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Very overwhelmed! My heart rate is rising! So many deadlines to meet & not feeling so well. I only have 24hrs! How?! Please help me!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text:
But I don’t want to jeopardise my students!
Nvm chill katy chill!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Early morning rattle of ppl getting paid a lot but not doing their job. Whereas me working ard the clock clearing their work. 😔😢😡 it’s just a job - remember!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text:
On my way home. Got to eat mutton steak becos I was really hungry. Gf walked & the entire geylang bazaar 3x for 6hrs & did not get the baju she wanted!
I’m so dead tired!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: I’m hungry! I want proper food but my gf taking so long to buy baju! Like 4 hrs!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Alhamduillah today break fast at bus stop outside Tanjong Katong complex. Cos no place anywhere else. Prayed in a small changing room in Joo chiat & TKC. Unique experience!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: The review was good. Doc was impressed with my Low triglycerides level. 🤗 basically everything is Low which is good! Well done! All the salad for breakfast worked! But he was not happy with 1 thing …🙁

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: I usually pray, eat breakfast & do work or watch tv. I seldom go out. Haha. My life - work, eat, sleep & repeat. 3 yrs ago, added spinning to the list. So mostly I’m at work or at home doing housework or schoolwork.

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text:
#Ramadanchallenge Day 23: past favourite Eid memory
Very long time back. Every year when we get to go & celebrate Eid with my grandmother! Actually it’s been years since I bought new clothes especially for Eid, dress up & went for proper visiting.

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: My bestie nv fails to amuse me! Thanks for the meet up! Quote: @keekiatonx10 remember 25 April, I met you despite the walk in the rain! Me: I met you despite my headache & had spicy soup splashed onto my eye! 🤪😂

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Is it me or the covid symptoms seems to be on and off! It’s been a month. Headache & body ache. Nausea. 😰

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Trouble of the heart!

author: Katy Belle Angelique
text: Woke up not feeling well. Hope it’s not C+ again!
